title: Pina Colada Pancakes with Rum Syrup
ingredients: ['For the rum syrup', 'big slug of golden rum (such as Mount Gay)', '3 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons syrup', 'For the pancakes', '160g plain flour', '1 teaspoon of baking powder', '1 teaspoon of bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon of salt', '4 eggs', '235ml milk', '225g coconut cream', '225g crushed pineapple, save half for garnish', 'oil or cooking spray', 'For garnish', 'icing sugar', 'toasted shredded coconut', 'other fresh fruit']
